Class Model

java.lang.Object
Model
class Model
extends java.lang.Object
The "SimpleERP" Model manages employee and sales information, manipulated through the Controller. It does not communicate with the View.
Author:
Raymond Shum

      private boolean addEmployeeSales​(int employeeID)
      Add values of employee's salesHistory to masterSalesRecord
      Parameters:
      employeeID - represents Employee.employeeID of object holding sales to be added to masterSalesRecord
      Returns:
      true if employee exists in staff array and sales can be added

    • removeEmployeeSales

      private boolean removeEmployeeSales​(int employeeID)
      Remove target employee's sales from masterSalesRecord
      Parameters:
      employeeID - target employee whose sales should be removed
      Returns:
      true if employee exists and false otherwise

    • removeEmployee

      public boolean removeEmployee​(int employeeID)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if employee is found

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if employee and sale exist
